text: Optics Communications is a peer-reviewed scientific journal published by Elsevier. It covers all fields of optical science and technology and was established in 1969. ==Abstracting and indexing== The journal is abstracted and indexed in: *Chemical Abstracts *Current Contents/Engineering, Computing & Technology *Current Contents/Physics, Chemical, & Earth Sciences *Ei Compendex *Engineering Index *Inspec *Scopus According to the Journal Citation Reports, the journal has a 2019 impact factor of 2.125. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Optics journals Category:Elsevier academic journals Category:Publications established in 1969 Category:English-language journals Category:Biweekly journals
title: Optics Communications
